meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dave Drew Rob Pold Blaze Newman Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #853.

td.p: Dave Drew, a tax preparer from Fresno, California
Rob Pold, a graduate student from Downers Grove, IL
Blaze Newman, a teacher from Encinitas, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $14,600)

tr.td: RELIGION
MOVIE TITLE ROLES
PROVERBS
RACQUET SPORTS
NUTMEGGERS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'To Christians it\'s part of the Bible, but to Jews, it\'s the entire Bible')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: To Christians it's part of the Bible, but to Jews, it's the entire Bible

eat to live
